archimate:BusinessObject.name: LogicalPhysicalResourceSpec
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: This defines the invariant attributes, methods, constraints, and relationships that exist between a particular LogicalResourceSpec and the PhysicalResourceSpec that it depends on.This association represents the binding between a set of LogicalResourceSpecifications and a set of PhysicalResourceSpecifications. The semantics of this binding are represented by the LogicalPhysicalResourceSpec association class.
